data.message: My phone sometimes, bugs me so bad.  Anyway...a lot of camera crews were at MLTAI today in Perry where I am in training class for blueprint reading and measuring. They went into two classes Mine was one of them. It's going to be on the news.  It's going on the news to promote prevailing wage and hire trained and skilled workers.  Instead of non-union companies, because of our training.  The director of the training school is buying both classes lunch tomorrow. We the people of Michigan Laborers across the state are ready to go to work for Flint#save Michigan waters #keepitlocal #puremichigan
